news_items.content: * TN bans mayonnaise made from raw eggs due to health concerns.
* High Court to take up suo motu writ against Tamil Nadu Minister Ponmudy over derogatory speech.
* Temporary sanitation workers' welfare help provided as Madras High Court takes action against Minister Ponmudy's remarks.
* Menstruating Dalit girl in Chennai made to take exam outside class, headmistress suspended.
* 1 Kg Cocaine Worth Rs 6 Crore Seized In Chennai, 8 Arrested.
* Strong dust storm hits Delhi, adjoining areas; IMD issues red alert.
* TN minister K N Nehru's MP son, brother diverted funds from â‚¹30 crore bank loan.
+ Bihar Pahalgam terror attack: Relatives of Manish Ranjan demand action against terrorists.
+ Health Indigenously developed HPV test kits for cervical cancer screening launched in Delhi.
+ Researchers in Nashik develop blood test to detect 30 different types of cancer.
* India suspends Indus Waters Treaty with Pakistan, shuts Wagah-Attari border in response to J&K attack.
